prompt: Professional male hospital administrator standing in a modern hospital corridor, captured in an authentic, editorial documentary style. The administrator is dressed in professional attire, exuding calm confidence with a focused, present expression. The environment features clean architectural lines, cool-neutral tones with subtle Surgical Blue and Signal Indigo accents, and softly diffused natural light. Generous negative space and a shallow depth of field keep the subject sharp while the background hospital setting is softly blurred, conveying sophisticated professionalism and operational readiness. No technology, no screens, no text, no posters, no whiteboards, no abstract shapes.
